author: Jean
text: This ugly ass website man ! I ordered 7 days ago my first pair from them! The Michigan dunks yellow and navy/black! In size 5.5 GS and let me tell u the left shoe is mad uglyyy! The swoosh is so noticeably messed up they look like fakes which they probably are ! And the stitching is off already! I just found out I can’t even make returns! I’m ordering on goat next time… never buying from y’all again. Can’t even get my 300$ back wdf! I’m making a YouTube video soon on my channel Jean Robles
title: FAKE SHOES

author: Varis
text:
Twice failed to complete my order of a FOG Essentials hoodie. Both times the hoodie they received didn't pass the authentication. The first time it took them a month to update the order status and eventually cancel it and the second time it took about a week and a half. 

The first time around I even sent multiple emails trying to cancel my order, however, not a single time did they get back to me. Time wasted, NON EXISTENT COMMUNICATION, yes not poor but NON EXISTENT communication. 

Never buying from them when there is KLEKT and other alternative services.

Even the way they reply to the customers on here is appalling. Same old "we are sorry, if you contact blah blah" BS. Not tackling the problem directly just redirecting everyone back to their website where the customer service doesn't work. Appalling.

P.S. Just like I predicted, their reply is the same old contact us on StockX. Aka they don't give a f.
title: Essentials Hoodies

author: Josh
text: I purchased shoes at a fairly decent price. Only 6 left in stock. 3 days pass and I was notified via email that I had been refunded. The seller had either refunded the buy price (bidding ask price 5-10 times higher than the actual buy price) or allowed time to elapse for sending the shoes to stockx verification process. This system is unreliable and leveraged to waste your time.
title: If you want to buy, you’ll buy high

author: juan cruz
text:
Fake positive reviews and sued by nike…
Fake positive reviews and sued by nike for fraud .: This is not the first time it happens. So within last 24 hours suddenly 200 positive reviews. Each 20 of those wrotten at the exact time the same day. Thats a total scam. They always do that everytime they get bad reviews. And all those reviews always look alike . This is not the first time it happens.make sure you click the bad reviews button instead of the general reviews. They were sued by nike for fraud. You can google it. This is a company with so many issues and no phone number . Is a hit or miss when you order with them. Again dont believe their reviews , if you didnt receive the item your order, or wrong item sent or you are not happy it will be a total headache as there is no phone number . Save your time
title: Fake positive reviews and sued by nike…
